auto_play:
Play the chart automatically
(DEBUG: can toggle midsong by pressing back [ESC or Backspace by default])
downscroll: Make notes fall down instead of rising up
hitsounds: Play a sound every note hit
offset:
How early/late the music is
(for headsets/speakers with audio delay)

How tight the 
"Sick"
window is to hit

"Good"
window is to hit
bad_window:

"Bad"
window is to hit
fps:
im sure you can guess
0 = No Limit
(Can be intensive!)
chart_player: If checked, only the strum/notes will load with no stage elements
